WRD_Karlach.synopsis: After fighting with the paladins, if players speak with Karlach they will get a small dialog in which she will go into a rage.
WRD_Karlach.how_to_trigger: Defeat the paladins with Karlach participating in the fight (in party, non-avatar) and finsihing it with her nearby or use the origins debug book (Karlach -> Paladins of Tyr -> Test enrage).

WRD_Karlach_5.speaker: Karlach
WRD_Karlach_5.text: Fuck them. Fuck Zariel. I won't go back. I'm never going back.
WRD_Karlach_5.context: NodeContext: Heaving with rage and laboured breath, maybe a hint of angry tears at the beginning devolving into laughter as she continues

WRD_Karlach_6.speaker: Karlach
WRD_Karlach_6.text: And if any of mummy's little friends want to pick up where the others left off... they'll find nothing but a pile of ash.
WRD_Karlach_6.context:
CinematicNodeContext: "And if any of Mummy's little friends..."
(flames go FULL INTENSITY)
"They'll find nothing but a pile of ash."

WRD_Karlach_8.speaker: Player
WRD_Karlach_8.text: Easy, Karlach. Those flames are getting big.

WRD_Karlach_3.speaker: Karlach
WRD_Karlach_3.text: Not big enough. Now get out before you get hurt. Now.
WRD_Karlach_3.context: NodeContext: Increasingly maniacal, leading to a berserker rage when the dialogue closes. Shouldn't be a threat to the player; she's still friendly and just excited to let loose her full rage.

WRD_Karlach_9.speaker: Player
WRD_Karlach_9.text: Zariel won't get near you again. We'll make sure of that.

WRD_Karlach_4.speaker: Karlach
WRD_Karlach_4.text: That's right, she won't. She can't. She couldn't even lay a finger. AHAHAHAHA!
WRD_Karlach_4.context: NodeContext: Increasingly maniacal, leading to a berserker rage when the dialogue closes.

WRD_Karlach_1.speaker: Karlach
WRD_Karlach_1.text: Zariel's gotta stop fucking with me, you know? I'm done with it. I'm done with her. I'm free. I'm FREE! AHAHAHAHA!
WRD_Karlach_1.context: NodeContext: Increasingly maniacal, leading to a berserker rage when the dialogue closes.
